text.div:
SmokingStatusValueSetMappingsLoincToSnomedCt (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ConceptMap/loinc-smoking-status-to-snomed-ct-uv-ips)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/current-smoking-status-uv-ips to urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38

DRAFT. Published on 2022-11-22 03:24:39+0000 by Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group (http://www.hl7.org/Special/com...).

Smoking Status: LOINC Answers to SNOMED CT concepts. Note that concepts in this map include SNOMED concepts from US Edition. This is an informative map and may be subject to future change.


Group 1Mapping from Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC) to SNOMED CT (all versions)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
LA18976-3 (Current every day smoker)is equivalent to449868002 (Smokes tobacco daily)
LA18977-1 (Current some day smoker)is equivalent to428041000124106 (Occasional tobacco smoker)
LA15920-4 (Former smoker)is equivalent to8517006 (Ex-smoker)
LA18978-9 (Never smoker)is equivalent to266919005 (Never smoked tobacco)
LA18979-7 (Smoker, current status unknown)is equivalent to77176002 (Smoker)
LA18980-5 (Unknown if ever smoked)is equivalent to266927001 (Tobacco smoking consumption unknown)
LA18981-3 (Heavy tobacco smoker)is equivalent to428071000124103 (Heavy tobacco smoker)
LA18982-1 (Light tobacco smoker)is equivalent to428061000124105 (Light tobacco smoker)

name: SmokingStatusValueSetMappingsLoincToSnomedCt
title: Smoking Status Value Set Mappings - LOINC to SNOMED CT
publisher: Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group
